name: Pouch (pouchthegame)
description:
Oh no! Your mom’s birthday is just a week away, and you have no supplies in the pantry to hold a party. It’s time for you to explore what lies beyond your little mouse hole to gather all the supplies–just you and your trusty pouch. You can only explore while the human is away, so you must uncover the many secrets in their room before they come home. Scurry, jump, and climb your way to all the party goodies. Adventure awaits! 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pouch is a semi-open world adventure game where you explore a handcrafted 3D world looking for items for your mom's birthday party. Explore the detailed environment and discover all 12 items to get the best ending and find easter eggs and secrets along the way.

See our website here:

https://pouchthegame.wixsite.com/home

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team: Noah Bell, Abigail Der, Minnie Xie, Tali Falk-Judson, Mira Jain

Special Thanks: Gracy-Mary Burega
